duties_responsibilities.duty: Onboard staff and develop robust training curriculum applicable to Medicaid PHE unwinding, regulations, rules, and policy, use of the SCDHHS eligibility systems, and culturally tailored customer service.
Identify and deliver continued training. Assess the effectiveness of training and modify training content as needed.
Provide oversight of the Training Specialist(s).

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Training and Development, Education, or a related field (Master's preferred)
